InstructionData.Title: multi-gas-one-display
InstructionData.Description: dial + console to allow selecting which tank is being viewed
InstructionData.Author: Basic IC10 Compiler
InstructionData.Instructions: # Switch on-off and see the pin's names alias display d0 #l.1 yield #l.1 # Single-dial gas tank viewer # hint: use an array of gas tanks printDisplay: # Compiled at 2025-10-21 18:10 by Exca's Basic10.
